casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. Giovanni GALANTI and Emilia Taraborelli, Appellants, v. Benjamin M. DAY, Commissioner of Immigration of the Port of New York, Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 4, 1929. No. 223. Gaspare M. Cusumano, of New York City, for appellants. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Leon E. Spencer, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
